TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit macOS extends System.Object implements class Xamarin.Forms.IConfigPlatform

Docs.summary: Marker class that identifies the macOS platform.
Docs.remarks: Developers specify the type name of this marker class to the method to specify the underlying iOS control on which to run a platform-specific effect.
